elements.name: User login and click compose Tweet button

steps.name: I go to the Twitter login page
I have logged in using valid credential
I click the Tweet button
Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
more Tweet button should be disabled as the message content is empty
submit Tweet button should be disabled as the message content is empty

elements.name: Post a single Tweet

steps.name: Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
I type Tweet messsage "My 1st Tweet" and submit
there will be status message showing "Your Tweet was sent."

comments.value: # Do I need to mention that I need to click to refresh

steps.name: the new Tweet is shown in my own Tweet list
the new Tweet is shown in the main page stream list

elements.name: Cancel posting a Tweet

steps.name: Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
I type Tweet messsage "Message to be cancelled" but not submit
I click close tweet popup button
there will be dialog box with header "Discard this Tweet?"
I click confirm button in dialog box

elements.name: User login and click compose Tweet button

steps.name: I go to the Twitter login page
I have logged in using valid credential
I click the Tweet button
Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
more Tweet button should be disabled as the message content is empty
submit Tweet button should be disabled as the message content is empty

elements.name: Post repeated Tweet using exactly the same message will not be allowed

steps.name: Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
I type Tweet messsage "Message to be duplicated" and submit
there will be status message showing "Your Tweet was sent."
I post a new Tweet with duplicated message content
there will be persistent status message showing "You have already sent this Tweet."

arguments.val: You have already sent this Tweet.

steps.name: text message in the tweet popup is maintained
I append "-- append message" to my Tweet message and submit
there will be status message showing "Your Tweet was sent."
the new Tweet is shown in my own Tweet list
the new Tweet is shown in the main page stream list

elements.name: User login and click compose Tweet button

steps.name: I go to the Twitter login page
I have logged in using valid credential
I click the Tweet button
Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
more Tweet button should be disabled as the message content is empty
submit Tweet button should be disabled as the message content is empty

elements.name: Post message chain with multiple Tweets

steps.name: Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
I add 3 Tweets with messege "Multiple messages" and submit
there will be status message showing "Your Tweets were sent."
the new Tweets are shown in the main page stream list
the new Tweets are shown in my own Tweet list
new Tweet1 is shown replied by 1 follower in my own Tweet list
new Tweet2 is shown replied by 1 follower in my own Tweet list
new Tweet3 is shown replied by 0 follower in my own Tweet list

elements.name: Post message chain and read message immediately (will fail)

steps.name: Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
I add 3 Tweets with messege "Multiple messages" and submit

result.error_message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Newly post message should appear in the main page stream list expected [true] but found [false]
	at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:96)
	at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:776)
	at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:44)
	at StepDefinitions.TweetTestStepDefinition.findNewTweetMsgs(TweetTestStepDefinition.java:199)
	at .And the new Tweets are shown in the main page stream list(TweetTest.feature:77)

steps.name: the new Tweets are shown in the main page stream list
the new Tweets are shown in my own Tweet list
new Tweet1 is shown replied by 1 follower in my own Tweet list
new Tweet2 is shown replied by 1 follower in my own Tweet list
new Tweet3 is shown replied by 0 follower in my own Tweet list

elements.name: Like Tweets

steps.name: Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
I add 3 Tweets with messege "Like message test" and submit
there will be status message showing "Your Tweets were sent."
I click like in new Tweet1 in the main page stream list
I click like in new Tweet3 in my own Tweet list
the new Tweets are shown in the main page stream list
new Tweet1 is shown liked by 1 follower in main page stream list
new Tweet3 is shown liked by 1 follower in main page stream list
new Tweet2 is shown liked by 0 follower in main page stream list
the new Tweets are shown in my own Tweet list
new Tweet1 is shown liked by 1 follower in my own Tweet list
new Tweet3 is shown liked by 1 follower in my own Tweet list
new Tweet2 is shown liked by 0 follower in my own Tweet list

elements.name: Unlike Tweets

steps.name: Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
I add 3 Tweets with messege "Like and unlike messages test" and submit
there will be status message showing "Your Tweets were sent."
I click like in new Tweet1 in the main page stream list
I click like in new Tweet2 in my own Tweet list
I click like in new Tweet2 in the main page stream list
new Tweet1 is shown liked by 1 follower in main page stream list
new Tweet2 is shown liked by 0 follower in main page stream list
new Tweet1 is shown liked by 1 follower in my own Tweet list
new Tweet2 is shown liked by 0 follower in my own Tweet list

elements.name: Retweet an existing Tweet without further comment

steps.name: Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
I add 3 Tweets with messege "Message to retweet" and submit
there will be status message showing "Your Tweets were sent."
I click retweet in new Tweet2 in the main page stream list without comment
new Tweet2 is shown retweeted by 1 follower in the main page stream list
new Tweet1 is shown retweeted by 0 follower in the main page stream list
new Tweet3 is shown retweeted by 0 follower in the main page stream list
new Tweet2 is shown retweeted by 1 follower in my own Tweet list
retweet label is shown in Tweet2 in my own Tweet list
new Tweet1 is shown retweeted by 0 follower in my own Tweet list
new Tweet3 is shown retweeted by 0 follower in my own Tweet list

elements.name: Retweet an existing Tweet with more comment

steps.name: Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
I add 3 Tweets with messege "More messages to retweet" and submit
there will be status message showing "Your Tweets were sent."
I click retweet in new Tweet2 in the main page stream list with comment "[RT] test"
all new and retweeted messages are shown in my own Tweet list
all new and retweeted messages are shown in the main page stream list

elements.name: Reply an existing Tweet with more comment

steps.name: Popup "Compose new Tweet" is shown
I add 3 Tweets with messege "Messages to be replied" and submit
there will be status message showing "Your Tweets were sent."
I click reply in new Tweet2 in my own Tweet list with message "REPLY Here!"
new Tweet3 is shown replied by 0 follower in the main page stream list
